name: preppy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young person from a rich family who goes to an expensive school and who wears expensive, tidy clothes

relating to or typical of a preppy: preppy clothes He's rich, preppy, but generally a nice guy.
More examplesFewer examplesThe store sells preppy kids' clothes.Last season's preppy look continues to dominate the high streets this autumn.If you prefer something preppier, try white and navy with a bit of bright green.
